title.narrative: PREMIER SOUS-PROGRAMME D'APPROVISIONNEMENT EN EAU POTABLE ET D'ASSAINISSEMENT (AEPA) EN MILIEU RURAL
Premier sous-programme d’approvisionnement en eau potable et d’assainissement (AEPA) en milieu rural

description.narrative: To ensure the sustainable supply of drinking water and sanitation in rural areas to improve their living conditions as well as the health of populations.
